sections.section text:
Users are able to reset their passwords through the NetID Self-Service Portal. The service offerings on this page allow you to report an issue or request a code/general help.
Visit the KnowledgeBase to learn more about Password Resets and NetID's.

sections.section title: Who Is Eligible to Use It?

sections.section text: To access the Password Reset System, visit the NetID Self-Service Portal.
There is no cost for this service at this time.
